carpet.rule.enableTickStepCounter.name: Tick Step Counter
carpet.rule.enableTickStepCounter.desc: Counts how many ticks have been step after last freeze.
TickStepCounter.stepped: This is the %s tick after /tick freeze.
carpet.rule.enableMountPlayers.name: Bypass Mount Player Restriction.
carpet.rule.enableMountPlayers.desc: Allow entity to mount player entities.
carpet.rule.allowUnsignedMessages.name: Allow Unsigned Messages
carpet.rule.allowUnsignedMessages.desc: Allow unsigned messages from offline players
carpet.rule.stopTickingWorldBorder.name: Stop Ticking World Border
carpet.rule.stopTickingWorldBorder.desc: Prevents the world border from updating its state each tick
carpet.rule.stopTickingWeather.name: Stop Ticking Weather
carpet.rule.stopTickingWeather.desc: Disables weather updates, such as rain or thunderstorms
carpet.rule.stopTickingTime.name: Stop Ticking Time
carpet.rule.stopTickingTime.desc: Halts the progression of the in-game time of day
carpet.rule.stopTickingBlocks.name: Stop Ticking Blocks
carpet.rule.stopTickingBlocks.desc: Prevents scheduled or random block ticks, such as crop growth or repeaters
carpet.rule.stopTickingFluids.name: Stop Ticking Fluids
carpet.rule.stopTickingFluids.desc: Stops fluid updates, like water or lava flow
carpet.rule.stopTickingRaid.name: Stop Ticking Raids
carpet.rule.stopTickingRaid.desc: Disables raid event updates and progression
carpet.rule.stopTickingChunkManager.name: Stop Ticking Chunk Manager
carpet.rule.stopTickingChunkManager.desc: Prevents the chunk manager from processing chunk loading and unloading
carpet.rule.stopTickingBlockEvents.name: Stop Ticking Block Events
carpet.rule.stopTickingBlockEvents.desc: Halts processing of queued block events, such as pistons
carpet.rule.stopTickingDragonFight.name: Stop Ticking Dragon Fight
carpet.rule.stopTickingDragonFight.desc: Freezes the ender dragon fight mechanics in the End dimension
carpet.rule.stopCheckEntityDespawn.name: Stop Checking Entity Despawn
carpet.rule.stopCheckEntityDespawn.desc: Disables despawn checks for entities, preventing them from despairing
carpet.rule.stopTickingEntities.name: Stop Ticking Entities
carpet.rule.stopTickingEntities.desc: Prevents entities, like mobs or players, from ticking
carpet.rule.stopTickingBlockEntities.des: Stops block entities, such as furnaces or chests, from ticking
carpet.rule.stopTickingSpawners.name: Stop Ticking Spawners
carpet.rule.enchantCommandLimitOverwrite: Set level limit of /enchant command to 255
carpet.rule.enchantCommandBypassItemType: Bypass item type restriction for /enchant command
carpet.rule.mergeSmartAndRegularCommandS: Merge Smart And Regular Command Suggestions

Carpet only shows smart suggestions while regular suggestions list is empty.
 This rule merges them into one list.
carpet.rule.silenceTP.name: SlienceTP
carpet.rule.silenceTP.desc: When you teleport real player, your GameMode will be spectator
carpet.rule.commandEasyItemShadowing.des: Use /itemshadowing can shadow the items of MainHand to the OffHand
carpet.rule.commandRenameItem.name: commandRename
carpet.rule.commandRenameItem.desc: Use /rename <name> name the item in hand. If there is no name parameter, restore the original name.
carpet.rule.instantSchedule.name: instantSchedule
carpet.rule.instantSchedule.desc: Tips:This is an experimental function. It might be that the game crashes
carpet.rule.instantFalling.name: instantFalling
carpet.rule.instantFalling.desc: Tips:This is an experimental function. It might be that the game crashes
carpet.rule.optimizedStructureBlock.name: Optimized Structure Block
carpet.rule.optimizedStructureBlock.desc: Optimized the logic for structure blocks when detect corners
carpet.rule.morphMovingPiston.name: Morph Moving Piston
carpet.rule.morphMovingPiston.desc: MovingPiston will behave like the block it is holding
carpet.rule.movingPistonSpeed.name: Moving Piston Speed
carpet.rule.movingPistonSpeed.desc: How fast the moving piston will move
carpet.rule.bedsRecordSleeperFacing.name: Beds Record Sleeper Facing
carpet.rule.bedsRecordSleeperFacing.desc: Beds will record the direction the player is facing before sleep
carpet.rule.copyablePlayerMessages.name: CopyablePlayerMessages
carpet.rule.moreHardCollisions.name: MoreHardCollisions
carpet.rule.moreHardCollisions.desc: Make falling_blocks, minecarts,tnts have hard collision
carpet.rule.farlandReintroduced.name: FarlandsReintroduced
carpet.rule.fallingSnowLayers.name: FallingSnowLayers
carpet.rule.fallingSnowLayers.desc: Snow layers will fall like sand
carpet.rule.hopperCounterDataRecorder.de: Record hopper counter's data to a file for hopper counter GUI
carpet.rule.bypassCrashForcibly.name: Bypass Crash Forcibly
carpet.rule.bypassCrashForcibly.desc: Avoid all crashes caused by server tick exceptions
carpet.rule.forceMaxLightLevel.name: Force Maximum Light Level
carpet.rule.forceMaxLightLevel.desc: Forces all block and sky light levels to be 15, making every area fully lit.
carpet.rule.disableLightUpdate.name: Disable Light Updates
carpet.rule.disableLightUpdate.desc: Prevents light level updates and propagation, keeping light levels static.
carpet.rule.scheduledTickVisualize.name: Scheduled Tick Visualization
carpet.rule.scheduledTickVisualize.desc: Visualizes scheduled ticks of blocks in the world
carpet.rule.hopperCooldownVisualize.name: Hopper Cooldown Visualization
carpet.rule.randomTickVisualize.name: Random Tick Visualization
carpet.rule.randomTickVisualize.desc: Visualizes random tick effects on blocks like crops and leaves
carpet.rule.gameEventVisualize.name: Game Event Visualization
carpet.rule.gameEventVisualize.desc: Visualizes game events such as vibrations for the Sculk system
carpet.rule.blockEventVisualize.name: Block Event Visualization
carpet.rule.blockEventVisualize.desc: Visualizes block events like piston activations
carpet.rule.blockUpdateVisualize.name: NC Update Visualization
carpet.rule.blockUpdateVisualize.desc: Visualize the area where NC updates occur
carpet.rule.stateUpdateVisualize.name: PP Update Visualization
carpet.rule.stateUpdateVisualize.desc: Visualize the area where PP updates occur
carpet.rule.comparatorUpdateVisualize.de: Visualize the area where comparator updates occur
carpet.rule.blocksNoSelfCheck.name: Block No Self Check
carpet.rule.blocksNoSuffocate.name: Blocks No Suffocate
carpet.rule.blocksPlaceAtAnywhere.name: Blocks Place Anywhere
carpet.rule.blocksPlaceAtAnywhere.desc: Allows placing blocks in invalid or normally restricted locations
carpet.rule.blockNoBreakParticles.name: Block No Break Particles
carpet.rule.blocksNoHardness.name: Block No Hardness
carpet.rule.blocksNoHardness.desc: Removes block hardness, making all blocks instant to break
carpet.rule.unicodeArgumentsSupport.name: Unicode Arguments Support
carpet.rule.unicodeArgumentsSupport.desc: Non-english arguments in commands will be supported
carpet.rule.commandEnhance.name: Command Enhance
